docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: EXPERIMENTAL drugs made of rare growth-promoting substances are producing dramatic benefits for some seriously ill patients.

headline.main: Cell Growth Factors Emerge as Potent Therapies

docs.snippet: LEAD: EXPERIMENTAL drugs made of rare growth-promoting substances are producing dramatic benefits for some seriously ill patients.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: AMERICANS who wonder about the safety of the food they eat are probably worried about the wrong thing, many authorities now say. The most urgent threat, these experts believe, comes not from pesticides and food additives, but from old-fashioned, natural microbes that contaminate poultry, eggs and meat.

headline.main: Officials Call Microbes Most Urgent Food Threat

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Mayor Edward I. Koch will urge the State Legislature today to approve a pilot program to ease overcrowding in psychiatric emergency rooms in New York City by committing some patients to a regimen of outpatient care. The program is also intended to improve supervision of potentially dangerous mentally ill patients.

headline.main: Koch Backs Pilot Plan to Aid the Mentally Ill

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The largest and most conclusive study of drug use in pregnancy has found that the use of cocaine or marijauna impairs fetal development.

headline.main: Study Ties Drugs to Impaired Fetuses

docs.snippet: LEAD: The largest and most conclusive study of drug use in pregnancy has found that the use of cocaine or marijauna impairs fetal development.
